articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Artillery Firing Drill of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Artillery Firing Drill of KPA
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, issued an order to conduct an artillery firing drill in order to examine the capability of artillery units to fight an actual war and guided it on the spot.
					 He learned about the training program and the deployment of firepower units from the commander of the exercise before ordering its start.
					
					 At that moment, an endless barrage of shells were fired by artillery pieces on the "enemy's positions," their roar rocking heaven and earth, and all of them were enveloped in flames.
					
					 Feasting his eyes at the "enemy positions" in flames, he was satisfied with the shells accurately hitting the targets.
					
					 He noted that if the drill leads to an actual battle, the enemies will be hit so hard by the retaliatory strikes of the infuriated powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu that they would not be able to raise their heads again.
					
					 He highly praised the artillerymen for their successful drill.
					
					 He said that he was examining the preparedness of units for an actual battle after issuing an order all of a sudden, adding that the drill once again convinced him that all the officers and men of the army are waiting for an order of the supreme commander for a final attack, keeping themselves in maximum alert.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be carried out by the army to make thorough preparations to go into action.
					
					 He also clarified in detail issues of further modernizing the artillery force to cope with the escalating reckless maneuvers of the enemies for a war of aggression.
					
					 He emphasized that the artillerymen should always be ready to open fire to hit the targets anytime an order is issued and deal merciless blows at the enemies when they preempt firing.
					
					 He saw the military hardware newly developed by the army.
					
					 He had a photo session with the service personnel of the units.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Yun Tong Hui, Kim Thaek Gu, Pak Tong Hak, Rim Kwang Il, Choe Pu Il, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Ra Chong Il and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, together with service personnel, enjoyed performance "Korea does what it is determined to do" given by the State Merited Chorus.
					 Kim Jong Un warmly waved to the enthusiastic cheers of the audience.
					
					 The performance began with orchestral music and male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					
					 Put on the stage were male chorus "The Glorious Motherland", "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" and "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", male duet and male chorus "Korea Does What It Is Determined to Do", male chorus " Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms", "We Will Defend Marshal Kim Jong Un with Our Lives" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of boundless reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who built up the strong national power of Songun Korea, and matchless courage and grit and outstanding leadership art of Kim Jong Un, who is steering the all-out action of all service personnel and people to protect the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un extended thanks to the artistes of the State Merited Chorus, expressing his great satisfaction over the splendid performance they staged reflecting the distinct revolutionary character and true nature of the KPA and the will of Songun Korea.
					
					 He said that the performance of the chorus makes everybody feel refreshed and reminds one of the volley firing by multiple rocket launch system, adding that it once again reinforced the belief that one should carry on the revolution, tightly holding arms.
					
					 He highly praised the chorus for representing "Song of the Korean People's Army" in such a manner that it sounds cheerful, dynamic and optimistic full of the militant stamina of the revolutionary army.
					
					 He expressed his expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus would inspire the service personnel and people to wage a dynamic struggle for a final victory in the future, too through its revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Jong Gak, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Yun Tong Hui, Kim Thaek Gu, Pak Tong Hak, Rim Kwang Il, Choe Pu Il, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Ra Chong Il and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Senior Party Officials Visit Hotel for Contributors to Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Senior Party Officials Visit Hotel for Contributors to Underground Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok and Jo Yon Jun Monday visited the hotel which hosts scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 They warmly congratulated the nuclear weapon developers who are spending pleasant days in Pyongyang, given the greatest privilege and favor under the loving care of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They said that the recent nuclear test represented a great victory which demonstrated that there is no limit to the will and capability of Songun Korea to protect the sovereignty and a signal victory in the history of the nation as it gave faith in sure victory and optimism to the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They asked them to achieve greater successes in scientific researches for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials braced themselves up to rapidly develop the nation's nuclear technology and thus make a positive contribution to further glorifying the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to scientists, technicians, workers, solider-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 An awarding ceremony took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak To Chun, and officials concerned, those scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials in the field of science for national defence.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who doubles as a member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, conveyed a decree of the SPA Presidium of the DPRK.
					
					 Those people who contributed to the successful nuclear test were awarded title of Hero of the DPRK with a gold star medal and Order of National Flag 1st Class, Order of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Il Prize.
					
					 59 were awarded wrist watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung, and 19 the wrist watches bearing the august name of general secretary Kim Jong Il, and 74 citations of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and 22 the citations of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Then speeches were made.
					
					 Speakers said that they would embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism and rapidly develop the nuclear technology of the country by raising the hot wind of pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology so as to further glorify the country as a matchless nuclear weapons state.
					
					 They pledged to keep today's honor and happiness, remain wholeheartedly loyal to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and continuously win fresh victories, united close around the Party.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Visit Museum of Weapons and Equipment
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Visit Museum of Weapons and Equipment
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The scientists, technicians, workers, and officials in the field of national defence science and soldier-builders who contributed to the third underground nuclear test visited the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army on Monday.
					 On display in the museum are different types of small arms, artillery pieces, tanks, armored vehicles, warships, airplanes and strategic rockets which were produced in the munitions factories of the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors were briefed on the fact that the museum was built thanks to the noble loyalty and moral sense of obligation of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is glorifying the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then they went round various exhibition wings and the outdoor exhibition ground of the museum.

articles.title: Active Three-Revolution Team Members Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Active Three-Revolution Team Members Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The participants in a national meeting of active three-revolution team members visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Monday.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, before paying silent tribute to them.
					
					 After going round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they visited his old home. They looked round historic relics, being briefed on the revolutionary careers of Kim Il Sung and his family members.
					
					 Meanwhile, they visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, E-library of Kim Il Sung University and the Three-Revolution Exhibition.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A birthday party was given at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday for those scientists, technicians, workers, and officials in the field of national defence science and solider-builders who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 Present there were Pak To Chun and officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and those greeting their birthdays.
					
					 Pak made a speech there.
					
					 He recalled that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that a birthday party was given for those of merits greeting their birthdays during their stay in Pyongyang.
					
					 He called on them to contribute to more fully demonstrating the dignity and might of the matchless nuclear weapons state by devotedly defending the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He called on all of them to bolster the nuclear deterrent of the country in every way by raising the hot wind of pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi Monday gave a reception at his embassy on the occasion of general secretary Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labour, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and others.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador said in his speech that the Iranian people joined the Korean people in celebrating the February holiday with splendor.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il who made devoted efforts for the prosperity of the country always lives in the hearts of the people.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK have steadily developed, and that the two countries have supported each other in international arenas from a common stand.
					
					Saying that thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the revolutionary cause of his predecessors is successfully being carried forward, he hoped that only victory and glory would be in store for the government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said it was an expression of deep reverence for Kim Jong Il that the Iranian friends joined the Korean people in marking the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il wisely led all works of the Party, state and army with his outstanding political ability and leadership ability to turn the country into an invincible socialist power.
					
					He also noted that Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation true to the lofty intention of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the government of the DPRK to further expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with Iran, guided by the idea of independence, friendship and peace, he stressed.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Last-ditch Efforts of Confrontation Maniac
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Last-ditch Efforts of Confrontation Maniac 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Confrontation maniac Chon Yong U of south Korea let loose invectives hurting the DPRK, forgetful of his miserable lot. 
					 At a recent press conference he said that "the north is under mental pressure for being weak" and "it is necessary to tighten sanctions against the north so that it may not hold out any longer." 
					
					 This is the same hysteric rhetoric as what traitor Lee Myung Bak uttered in his speech made before leaving his office in a bid to justify the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It is awfully disgusting that Chon is still wagging his tongue, clinging to the coattail of Lee Myung Bak more dead than alive. 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that Chon unhesitatingly let loose a spate of rubbish hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with taking issue with the DPRK's access to nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 As far as Chon is concerned, he is the worst type stooge of the U.S. as he took the lead in shaping and implementing anti-DPRK confrontation policies at the headquarters of south Korea's mendicant and solicitation diplomacy. 
					
					 In May of 2005 when he held the post of chief for diplomacy and publicity policies, he desperately played the role of a shock brigade in the anti-DPRK nuclear campaign, asserting that "the nuclear issue of the north is an intolerable threat to the world peace and security". 
					
					 After becoming the chief secretary for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae, he blustered that "south-north dialogue is possible only after the north makes an apology for the warship 'Cheonan' case and the Yonphyong Island shelling and it is denuclearized."
					
					 He is the sworn enemy of the nation as he spread the "story of collapse of the social system in the north" and malignantly defamed the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its system whenever opportunity presented itself. 
					
					 He should have already been thrown into a boiling cauldron for his crimes he committed. However, this lunatic is still crying out for "sanctions" and "pressure" on the DPRK. He is just like a puppy suffering from mange that barely lives on the food leftover thrown out by his master. 
					
					 The DPRK is a great power in which the single-mindedly united leader, party, army and people form a community linked with the same destiny and its might is inexhaustible. It was proved by its satellite launch which demonstrated the overall national power and the tremor made by the nuclear deterrence for self-defence. 
					
					 Can such puppets as Chon ever block the victorious advance of the DPRK? 
					
					 The base behavior of the group of traitors stemmed from their inveterate disposition of confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The group is so displeased with the signal successes of the DPRK that it is making last-ditch efforts till the last moments of its destruction to make the policy of confrontation with compatriots go on. 
					
					 The Lee group is bound to meet its miserable end as it has pursued an anachronistic confrontation policy only, unaware of where is the way to genuine prosperity of the nation. 
					
					 All Koreans will mercilessly punish such group of traitors as Lee Myung Bak and Chon Yong U, dregs of history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Drive to Push Back Frontiers of Latest Science, Technology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamic Drive to Push Back Frontiers of Latest Science, Technology 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- All the officials, party members and other people should achieve great successes in the building of a thriving nation by pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology with the same spirit and mettle as displayed by the great Paektusan nation in launching satellites and accessing the nukes, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an editorial. 
					 It is the brilliant fruition of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science and technology that the DPRK has become a nuclear weapons state and a space power possessed of the cutting-edge science and technology, the editorial says, and goes on:. 
					
					 On the basis of these achievements we must further spur the drive to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology in all fields. We must put overall science and technology of the country including metal, mining and light industries, agriculture and applied technology on the world level. 
					
					 All the people should conduct the drive for pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology with pure loyalty and strong sense of moral obligation like the satellite scientists who conquered space and like those merited people who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test to help the country emerge as a power of science and technology, and glorify the immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il all over the world. 
					
					 It is the worthwhile struggle for turning the country into an economic power at an early date to vigorously conduct the drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology. 
					
					 This drive is the short-cut for building an economic power as early as possible by our own efforts and with our own technology after frustrating the persistent economic sanctions of the imperialists. 
					
					 Victory is in store for the DPRK as it is wisely led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and it has the most advantageous Korean-style socialist system and precious successes and experience.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Lee Myung Bak for His Crimes Committed against Reunification during His Office
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Lee Myung Bak for His Crimes Committed against Reunification during His Office 
						
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Since traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea came to power, he has brought to naught all valuable successes made in the north-south relations under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. Consequently, the north-south confrontation has got worse with each passing day, pushing the situation to the brink of war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have become so tense that the Korean Peninsula is threatened with armed clash. This grave situation is an inevitable product of the moves of the Lee group of traitors to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove the crimes committed by the group during its five year-long office.
					
					 The achievements made in the inter-Korean relations since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration were possible thanks to the concerted efforts of all Koreans in the north and the south, it says, and goes on:
					
					 They pooled their efforts and wisdom to achieve reconciliation and unity in the idea of "By our nation itself." But, the Lee group steeped in the conception of confrontation to the marrow of its bone insisted that the north-south relations should be those of confrontation, not the ones guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and the ones seeking reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Based on such anti-reunification conception, the Lee group has persistently pursued the policy of confrontation -- "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" -- and kept the door of the inter-Korean relations closed during its office, talking about the "adherence to principles" and "waiting strategy". 
					
					 The group insisted that neither dialogue nor cooperation and exchange are possible unless such preconditions as "the north's dismantlement of its nukes before anything else" and "opening" seeking sinister purposes are met. This was the ulterior aim sought by Lee in bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse. 
					
					 The group kicked off a frantic anti-DPRK campaign in collusion with outside forces, taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the third underground nuclear test. 
					
					 The past five years of nightmare teaches a bitter lesson that the nation should never allow such inhuman scum as the Lee group to come to power again and play with the destiny of Koreans and that such group of traitors should be eliminated to the end from the very  day of its emergence.
					
					 All Koreans will chase the Lee group on the way of going to its graves and force it to pay for all its hideous crimes committed against the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: No One Can Take Issue with DPRK's Just Step for Self-Defence: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Take Issue with DPRK's Just Step for Self-Defence: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The underground nuclear test of the DPRK is a product of the high-handed moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to stifle it and part of its just step for self-defence to cope with the U.S. imperialists' undisguised nuclear threat and blackmail, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined article.
					 In the new century the U.S. imperialists have more persistently resorted to the nuclear blackmail against the DPRK since they put it on the list of targets of their nuclear attacks, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 This compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrence to foil the U.S. imperialists' scenario for a nuclear war. 
					
					 Had the DPRK failed to have access to the strong nuclear deterrence to frustrate their moves, a war would have broken out on the Korean Peninsula several times. 
					
					 The DPRK's third underground nuclear test offered an important occasion in protecting peace and security on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and the world. 
					
					 It is the comments of not a few military experts that the DPRK's successful nuclear test made a big contribution to ensuring peace and security on the peninsula and in its vicinity and the rest of the world. 
					
					 The DPRK's access to powerful nuclear deterrent told the world that gone are the days never to return when the U.S. imperialists could pose a unilateral nuclear threat to the former.
					
					 They had better refrain from resorting to a foolish adventure to test the DPRK. 
					
					 Nukes are by no means a monopoly of the U.S.

articles.title: Renovated Grinding System Goes Operational at Komdok Mining Complex
articles.content:
Renovated Grinding Shop Bring to Completion at Komdok Mining Complex
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The grinding shop at Dressing Plant No. 3 of the Komdok Mining Complex situated in South Hamgyong Province has been renovated and brought to completion.
					 The renovation of the grinding shop provided a firm foundation of increasing the production of nonferrous metals and could contribute to the economic development of the country and the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 An opening of the shop took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials concerned and officials and employees of the complex.
					
					 At the ceremony a message of thanks of the Central Committee of the WPK was conveyed to workers, technicians and officials who performed merits in the renovation project.
					
					 The C.C., the WPK in the message said that the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying out the behests of general secretary Kim Jong Il, acquainted himself in detail with the renovation project and brightly indicated the direction and ways for completing the project in the shortest time.
					
					 The message highly appreciated the workers, technicians and officials of the complex for successfully completing the project by displaying popular heroism and self-sacrificing spirit.

articles.title: DPRK's Marathoner Awarded Gold Medal at Asian Marathon Championship
articles.content:
DPRK's Marathoner Awarded Gold Medal at Asian Marathon Championship
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK marathoner Kim Kum Ok won a gold medal at the 14th Asian Marathon Championship held in Hong Kong Feb. 24.
					 Kim recorded two hours, 32 minutes and 21 seconds.
					
					 The championship brought together more than 40 marathoners from 20 countries and regions including the DPRK, China, Mongolia and Japan.

articles.title: Women Called "Pyongyang Girls"
articles.content:
Women Called "Pyongyang Girls" 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- It is well known in the DPRK that girls in Pyongyang volunteered to work at the Taehung Youth Hero Mine some twenty years ago.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, in high appreciation of their deeds, saw to it that their noble spiritual world and view of life were well known in the country.
					
					 When he was making a guidance tour of the mine in May Juche 98 (2009), he took in the view of the Taehung Noodle House and said it was built splendidly.
					
					 During his guidance tour of the mine in October 2011, he visited the restaurant and highly praised its employees for having built it by themselves in a year.
					
					 He also appreciated its cooks for their good service for miners.
					
					 He was very pleased to hear that most of the cooks were women who volunteered from Pyongyang to work at the mine more than 20 years ago when they were girls.
					
					 He emotionally called the women in their forties "Pyongyang girls" well known throughout the country.
					
					 He then had a picture taken with them, suggesting the photo being decorated with letters "Pyongyang girls".
					
					 Later, he invited them to Pyongyang and personally chose a shopping mall where they could buy gifts for their parents they would meet after two decades. And he said he would pay for what they would buy.
					
					 During their stay in Pyongyang he gave a reception in honor of them.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Agro-forestry Management
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Agro-forestry Management
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has directed big efforts to agro-forestry management activities.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Director Kim Kwang Phil and Senior Counsellor Kim Kwang Ju of the Land and Environmental Conservation Exchange Company under the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation.
					
					 Question: Would you like to tell me about the achievements the country has scored in agro-forestry management activities?
					
					 Answer (Kim Kwang Phil): After an experience-sharing workshop on the agro-forestry management, which was held in Suan County, North Hwanghae Province in November Juche 101 (2012), the activities have gained momentum in various local regions.
					
					 Arable land for agro-forestry management has sharply increased, especially in Kaechon City in South Phyongan Province and Yonggwang and Jongphyong counties in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 More than 100 sloping land user groups have already been active in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The activities include cross visits among the groups, training of technicians and workshops on agro-forestry management.
					
					 Question: I would like to hear about the experience gained in the activities and their prospect.
					
					 Answer (Kim Kwang Ju): The government chose the Suan County as an exemplary area and began launching the activities in 2004 in cooperation with the sloping land user groups in the county.
					
					 At the first, trees, crops, herbs and wild edible greens were planted in forests in a three-dimensional way, interwoven with pasturage. Then the scope of such management has gradually been expanded.
					
					 The groups are required to properly carry out the land utility plan with priority given to dissemination of scientific and technological information and land inclinations, fertility of soil and distances from communities taken into consideration
					
					 Dry-field rice is mainly cultivated instead of maize, with primary efforts being paid to crop diversification in accordance with specific features of sloping lands.
					
					 Crop rotation takes place each year and double-cropping is done if possible.
					
					 The company plans to expand the management activities on degraded sloping lands by the year 2015.

articles.title: New Hi-Temperature, Air Combustion Rolling Furnace Goes Operational at Chollima Steel Complex
articles.content:
New Hi-Temperature, Air Combustion Rolling Furnace Goes Operational at Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A project for introducing a high-temperature, air-combustion technology by the gasification of anthracite was successfully finished at the Chollima Steel Complex.
					 The workers, technicians and officials of the complex completed in a short span of time such a huge project as the construction of a gas-generator shop and a medium hi-temperature, air-combustion heating furnace for rolling.
					
					 The use of hi-temperature, air-combustion technology provided a foundation for massively producing the rolled steel by relying on the local supply of the fuel rich in the DPRK. It also brought about a big advance in making the country's metal industry more Juche-oriented and modern.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony was held on Monday.
					
					 Read out at the ceremony was a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the workers, technicians and officials of the complex who rendered brilliant labor services in completing the project.
					
					 An inaugural address was followed by speeches.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round a general control room, the medium hi-temperature, air-combustion heating furnace for rolling, etc.

articles.title: Vishwanath Leaves Here
articles.content:
Vishwanath Leaves Here
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, left here on Monday. He doubles as secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council.

articles.title: Projected Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed
articles.content:
Projected Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are mulling staging joint military exercises Key Resolve simulating the deployment of the U.S. reinforcements in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula from March 11 to 21 and offensive exercises Foal Eagle in the ground, sea and air from March 1 to April 30. To be involved in these war maneuvers are U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, including more than 10,000 U.S. troops from overseas, and huge armed forces of the puppet army and latest war hardware.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers describe the projected war manoeuvres as "annual and defensive" but this rhetoric can never conceal their belligerent nature as they are certain to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the peninsula.
					
					 A tough-and-go situation is now prevailing on the peninsula due to the vicious hostile actions of the U.S. and its allies and their military racket over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its step for bolstering nuclear deterrent to protect its sovereignty.
					
					 The south Korean military is closeted with the U.S. over the issue of including the concept of "preemptive strike" in the "tailored deterrent strategy", openly crying out for "mounting preemptive strike even if it may entail a war".
					
					 Meanwhile, they are staging madcap war maneuvers such as joint naval drill and joint anti-submarine drill with the U.S., while putting spurs to building a "missile shield".
					
					 A lot of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and latest nuclear attack means have already been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity and huge armed forces of the three services of the puppet army and all ministries and agencies of the south Korean "government" have been put on a wartime posture.
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to clearly prove how just the DPRK was when it had access to tremendous nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the hostile forces' ever-increasing threat of aggression.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers dare ignite a war of aggression by staging the joint military exercises against the DPRK, from that moment their fate will be hung by a thread with every hour. Its warning is by no means a threat.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean War Manoeuvres against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean War Manoeuvres against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces and the south Korean air force staged a drill for wartime operation from February 12 to 15.
					 They conducted provocative large-scale joint military exercises whose program involved "detecting and tracking ballistic missile and anti-ship firing and detecting and tracking submarine, etc. from early in February till mid-February in the East Sea of Korea. In their wake they staged joint anti-submarine exercises including drills for countering torpedo attack and drills of sea-patrol planes for detecting and attacking targets under the signboard of bolstering the U.S.-south Korean "joint operation capability."
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers announced their plan to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in March.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of a criminal scenario to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 What is ridiculous that the warmongers are employing a trite method of conducting counter-propaganda.
					
					 "Grave challenge" and "threat" touted by them sound as nothing but a shrill cry made by those scared stiff by the might of Songun Korea ready not to pardon the violators of its sovereignty.
					
					 If the U.S. warmongers have an iota of discretion, they should bear in mind what consequences will be entailed by their infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 If they ignite a war against the north in the end, they are bound to perish in the flames kindled by them.
					
					 They had better behave themselves, keenly aware of the gravity of the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Protest against Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Protest against Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
						
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Protest actions against Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets were staged in Seoul and various other parts of south Korea on February 22, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The Volunteer Corps for Tok Islets, the People Who Love Tok Islets and other organizations held press conferences outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul at which they condemned the "Takeshima (Tok Islets) Day" event to be sponsored by the Shimane Prefecture of Japan.
					
					 They urged the Japanese authorities to immediately retract their unreasonable claim to Tok Islets.

articles.title: S. Koreans Accuse Japan of Denying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Koreans Accuse Japan of Denying Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Japan's act of blemishing the statue of a girl, victim of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, is touching off anger among south Korean people, according to CBS of south Korea on Feb. 23.
					 It was reported that posted on a website of Japan is a composed picture defiling the statue standing before the Japanese embassy in Seoul as that of "prostitute."
					
					 Infuriated by this, South Korean internet subscribers held that this indicates the level of Japan negating its past crimes, far from repenting of them.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Attempt to Suppress Jongyojo under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Attempt to Suppress Jongyojo under Fire 
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "government" authorities disclosed their attempt to suppress Jongyojo (Teachers Union), according to south Korean KBS on Feb. 22. 
					 The Ministry of Employment and Labor forced Jongyojo to amend its rules, charging that they run counter to the law on teachers' union. 
					
					 The ministry threatened to take a measure of not recognizing the legal status of the organization in case it refuses to meet the demand.

articles.title: Actions for Settlement of Labour Issue Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Settlement of Labour Issue Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Feb. 23 at which it denounced the puppet regime's unpopular rule.
					 It was attended by more than 4000 workers from across south Korea.
					
					 Speakers slammed the "government" authorities for having failed to settle the labour issue, including the situation at Hanjin Heavy Industries and Ssangyong Motors.
					
					 They declared they would continue staging large-scale actions till the demand of trade unions has been met.
					
					 At the end of the rally its participants staged a demonstration in protest against the authorities' unpopular rule.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Japan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-Japan friendship meeting took place in Japan on Feb. 20 to celebrate the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there were members of Japan-DPRK friendship organizations, including the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Tokyo Metropolitan Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The participants listened to the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, called for waging a dynamic movement across Japan to make progress in improving Japan-DPRK relations and DPRK-U.S. relations despite the very difficult situation created by the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Nam Sung U recalled that the atmosphere of opposing the DPRK and Chongryon and the DPRK-Japan friendship is mounting in Japanese society, stressing the need to strengthen the work to improve DPRK-Japan friendship and normalize the relations between them through unity and solidarity.
					
					 Other speakers referred to the fact that the moves to obliterate national education have reached a serious phase as evidenced by the fact that only Korean schools were excluded from the tuition-free program for senior high schools and subsidies to Korean schools were suspended in different parts of Japan. They called upon people of all social standings to take an active part in the actions to settle the issue of supporting Korean schools.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Poland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Poland
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Polish website DPRK on February 16 posted photos on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The website was entitled "Congratulation on the birthday of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people" illustrated with the portrait of a smiling Kim Jong Il in the background of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It carried more than 20 photos of him giving field guidance to the light industrial sector.
					
					 The notice of the website said:
					
					 February 16 this year is the 71st birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He always put the happiness of the people before all his work and activities.
					
					 On this significant day the website carries photos dealing with his life devoted to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Romania, Mali and Guinea on February 14 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that Kim Jong Il was the greatest man who performed immortal exploits in carrying out not only the Korean revolution but also the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman went on:
					
					 We will never forget the exploits he performed in developing the friendly relations between Romania and the DPRK.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania will invariably make all efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the Workers' Party of Korea in the future, too.
					
					 The department director of the Malian Prime Minister's Office said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, fully possessed of personality and qualifications of a great man, was an extraordinary thinker and theoretician and peerlessly elder statesman who wisely led the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence with his profound ideological and theoretical wisdom and outstanding leadership.
					
					 He set an example in carrying out the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leader unprecedented in the human history of politics and made the august name and revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung shed their rays forever.
					
					 His whole life is the most brilliant one of a peerless patriot and great revolutionary who devoted his all to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Ukrainian Bodies Support Just Cause of DPRK
articles.content:
Ukrainian Bodies Support Just Cause of DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Ukrainian bodies issued statements in support of the just cause of the Korean people on Jan. 28.
					 Two organizations in a joint statement expressed the positive support for the stance of the DPRK to continuously pursue the independent space development and further bolster up the nuclear deterrent.
					
					 They are the Dnepropetrovsk branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Dnepropetrovsk branch of the Ukraine-DPRK Association.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. and its allies for cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council in a base way.
					
					 We reject the hostile policy towards the DPRK pursued by the UN, which has been reduced to a henchman of the U.S. from a prestigious international body.
					
					 Socialist Korea is dealing a merciless blow at the hostile forces with its brilliant successes in all fields, typically the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 The Officers Union of the Soviet Union in a statement warmly congratulated the Korean people on their success in the satellite launch.
					
					 Tensions mount high on the Korean Peninsula as the UNSC cooked up the U.S.-proposed "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in wanton violation of the legitimate right of a sovereign state to use the space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 We support the statements of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and its Foreign Ministry bitterly rejecting the unwarranted resolution.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the base moves of the U.S. and forces following it.
					
					 We urge the UNSC to roll back the discriminatory "resolution" at once.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent, Treasured Sword for Justice: Ugandan Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent, Treasured Sword for Justice: Ugandan Body
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement released a statement on Feb. 14 as regards the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test.
					 The DPRK is prohibited from launching satellites even though other countries are allowed to do so: This is a brigandish logic, the statement said, adding that this is the most unpardonable insult to the Korean people and a mockery of them.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is now escalating the tensions to the extremes by deploying huge nuclear hardware for military offensive on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity and waging drills for mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 Such brazen-faced practices touched off serious anti-U.S. feelings of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 We can no longer tighten our belts the blame for which rests with the U.S. Let us fight against the U.S. to defend the sovereignty of the nation and win a final victory. Let us show the U.S. enemy the mettle of the Koreans. This is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The 3rd underground nuclear test was the demonstration of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent.
					
					 No one has the right to take issue with it as it was a legitimate self-defensive measure, an exhibition of the towering rage of the army and the people of the DPRK and a display of their will to defend the country's sovereignty and their capabilities.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent is a just treasured sword for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country which makes it possible to smash the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's nuclear test.

articles.title: Russian Media on DPRK's Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Russian Media on DPRK's Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia aired a commentary on the DPRK's successful 3rd underground nuclear test on Feb. 21.
					 The radio elaborated on the three nuclear tests that were carried out by the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 No one should expect that the DPRK will abandon its nuclear program under the pressure of the international community or in return for aid from the world.
					
					 The DPRK has its own valid reasons for desiring to become a nuclear power.
					
					 First, it regards nukes as a guarantee for defending the security of the country.
					
					 This is fully understandable when taking into account the situation of Iraq and other countries.
					
					 Second, the DPRK thinks that it can pursue its diplomatic policy by wresting the initiative in the international community once it has nukes.
					
					 The international community will have to admit that the DPRK can be a nuclear power in the future.
					
					 No one can prevent the DPRK from ranking itself among the nuclear powers.
					
					 The DPRK stated several times to the world it will never abandon its nuclear program and that it was ready to respond to the call for the negotiations for restricting nuclear missiles.
					
					 Time has come to accept the unavoidable situation.
					
					 The world should learn the way of co-existing with nukes of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Regional Organization, Myanmar Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Regional Organization, Myanmar Figure
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A regional organization and a Myanmar figure praised general secretary Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits.
					 Lyne Sinyodyium, councilor of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, the sun of Songun" posted on its website on Feb. 18:
					
					 The DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and the third underground nuclear test are praiseworthy events that fully demonstrated the might of Songun Korea under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They are the best gifts of the Korean people to Kim Jong Il, the sun of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK both in name and in reality ranked itself with dignity among nuclear weapons states and states of manufacturing and launching satellites.
					
					 This would be unthinkable apart from the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, a great thinker and theoretician, outstanding strategist and benevolent father of people.
					
					 Than Tun, general director for Administrative Affairs of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited, said in a statement on Feb. 15 that he looked back with deep emotion upon the career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il steadily developed the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army, true to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung, and put the national capability of the DPRK on a high level.
					
					 He firmly defended socialist Korea from the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle it and turned it into a powerful nation of single-hearted unity and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will surely be accomplished thanks to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian newspaper Byvor on February 15 carried an article with a photo of Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm. The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's was a life devoted to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, the reunification of the country and the accomplishment of global independence, true to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great Songun brilliant commander, dear father of people and peerless patriot who wisely led socialist construction with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom and outstanding leadership, fully possessed of personality and qualifications as a statesman.
					
					 The Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise on Feb. 15 carried an article with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					  The article said that he performed immortal exploits in carrying out the socialist cause, adding his greatest feat was that he defended socialism.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on Feb. 17 said:
					
					 The socialist policies have been invariably enforced and many grand edifices for the wellbeing of the people built in the DPRK under his leadership.
					
					 The immortal exploits he performed in carrying out the socialist cause will remain in the hearts of humankind forever.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Ecuador, Myanmar and Austria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Ecuador, Myanmar and Austria
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Ecuador, Myanmar and Austria to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) on February 14 and 15.
					 Seen in the venues of the meetings were photos dealing with the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing the invincible might of Songun Korea.
					
					 Milton Burbano, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was a great leader who turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state manufacturing and launching satellites recognized by the world.
					
					 A member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying out the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is wisely leading the Korean people to the building of a thriving nation and the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for providing an eternal foundation for victory and prosperity of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website on February 12 an article titled "February of ardent yearning" on the occasion of general secretary Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The article said:
					
					 The south Korean people are highly praising the exploits he performed on behalf of the era and the nation with deep reverence for him, great father of the nation, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 They said that he was a great statesman who provided foundations for the development of the relations between the south and north, peace and prosperity by providing the south-north summit and the adoption of the historic June 15 South-North Joint Declaration and October 4 declaration.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and exploits will remain forever along with the history of the nation.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the sun of the nation, the stirring June 15 era of reunification in which the sufferings and miseries of nation's division disappeared like thaw in spring could be prevailed on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 He devoted his all to the great national unity, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the divided country. He was, indeed, the greatest and extraordinary patriot unprecedented in human history.
					
					 So the progressive organizations and people in south Korea gave wide publicity on their websites to the greatness and undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The voices admiring the peerless great man will reverberate far and wide in February thanks to the deep reverence of compatriots in south Korea.
					
					 The website also carried photos featuring happy Korean people who are enjoying the material and cultural life as the master of the state and society under the socialist system centered on the masses.

articles.title: ACNC comenta ultima chismografia de Chon Yong U
articles.content:
ACNC comenta ultima chismografia de Chon Yong U
 Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- El maniaco de enfrentamiento surcoreano Chon Yong U volvio a pronunciar tonterias pese a su miserable situacion a punto de arruinamiento.
					 En una rueda de prensa concedida recientemente, el parloteo que el "Norte (de Corea) esta bajo la presion mental que sufre un debil" y "hay que aplicarle una sancion insoportable".
					
					 Es otra locura histerica que hace recordar el discurso de retiro de su amo Lee Myung Bak quien intento justificar su politica de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Lo insoportable del caso es que Chon censuro el disuasivo nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hablo mal hasta de la direccion suprema de esta.
					
					 Chon es lacayo de peor calana de la diplomacia surcoreana que en ambito externo, practico la diplomacia suplicante y en el interno, se puso al frente de la elaboracion y ejecucion de la politica conflictiva con la RPDC siguiendo los mandatos de Estados Unidos.
					
					 En mayo de 2005, cuando se desempenaba como jefe de la oficina politica de informacion y diplomacia, actuo como avanzada de la campana nuclear anti-RPDC diciendo que el "problema nuclear del Norte deviene una amenaza intolerable para la paz y seguridad del mundo".
					
					 Despues de que fuera designado jefe de diplomacia y seguridad de Chongwadae, frecuentaba decir que "sera posible el dialogo Sur-Norte cuando el Norte pida disculpas por el incidente de la corbeta surcoreana 'Cheonan' y el fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong y se logre la desnuclearizacion".
					
					 Y ademas, difamo atrevidamente la maxima dignidad y regimen de la RPDC circulando el "rumor de derrumbe del Norte de Corea".
					
					 Ese discapacitado mental debe saber que la RPDC es la potencia de unidad monolitica en que el lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo comparten el mismo destino.
					
					 Lo comprueba el hecho de que se lanzo con exito el satelite artificial demostrando el poderio integral de la RPDC y se realizo sucesivamente la prueba nuclear que sacudio a todo el mundo.
					
					 ?Podran bloquear acaso el avance de la RPDC los fantoches como Chon?
					
					 Espantada ante los exitos fulminantes de la RPDC, la banda traidora surcoreana trata de hacer valer hasta el ultimo momento su politica de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La nacion coreana castigara implacablemente a la horda de traidores y basuras de la historia como Lee Myung Bak y Chon Yong U.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a desplegar campana de conquista de tecnicas de punta
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a desplegar campana de conquista de tecnicas de punta
 Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- Todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y otros trabajadores deben lograr los exitos orgullosos al conquistar la tecnologia de punta en la campana por construir un Estado prospero con el impetu y coraje de la potencia del monte Paektu que cuenta con las armas nucleares y el satelite.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					 La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se ha convertido en el pais poseedor de armas nucleares y la potencia espacial de talla mundial controlando las arterias de la ciencia y tecnica de punta, lo cual se debe a la politica del PTC de dar importancia a la ciencia y tecnica.
					
					 Debemos desarrollar globalmente y a toda marcha la campana por alcanzar los niveles sofisticados a base de los exitos ya logrados y poner dignamente en el nivel mundial la ciencia y tecnologia del pais en conjunto. 
					
					 Tenemos que librar con dinamismo la campana de la conquista de la tecnologia sofisticada con la fidelidad y la noble obligacion moral siguiendo a los cientificos que conquistaron el espacio y a los contribuyentes al exito en la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea y asi glorificar la patria como potencia cientifico-tecnica y transmitir a todo el mundo las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Hoy en dia, desplegar con dinamismo la campana en cuestion constituye una digna lucha por construir cuanto antes la potencia economica con nuestras fuerzas y tecnica frustrando la brutal sancion economica de los imperialistas.
					
					 Gracias a la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el mas superior regimen socialista al estilo coreano y los ya obtenidos exitos y experiencias preciosas, sera cierta la victoria en la campana por conquistar la tecnologia de punta.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes de Lee Myung Bak cometidos en su mandato en contra de reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela crimenes de Lee Myung Bak cometidos en su mandato en contra de reunificacion
 Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el mandato del traidor Lee Myung Bak acabo con todos los valiosos exitos logrados en las relaciones intercoreanas en virtud de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y agravo el estado de enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas hasta llevarlo al borde de guerra, y prosigue:
					 La grave situacion de hoy, en que las relaciones intercoreanas estan a punto de intercambio de fuegos, es producto inevitable de la campana de confrontacion fratricida que lanzo la banda del traidor Lee.
					
					 Los exitos logrados en las relaciones intercoreanas despues de publicada la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio se prepararon en el marco de los esfuerzos conjuntos de todos los connacionales del Norte y el Sur por lograr la reconciliacion y unidad basandose en el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					 Sin embargo, la banda de Lee, cautivada por la concepcion conflictiva, se propuso establecer las relaciones intercoreanas no para la reconciliacion y unidad entre los coterraneos sino para el enfrentamiento.
					
					 A base de esa concepcion, persiguio obstinadamente durante el lustro de su mandato la politica conflictiva conocida como "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3 mil dolares" y dejo congeladas las relaciones Norte-Sur hablando del "mantenimiento de principios" y la "estrategia de espera".
					
					 Presento las premisas de mal designio como "renuncia nuclear primero" y "apertura" e insistio en no realizar el dialogo ni el intercambio o cooperacion antes de que ellas sean cumplidas.
					
					 En cuanto al lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos y la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC, comenzo una demencial campana conflictiva anti-RPDC en confabulacion con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					 Los 5 anos de pesadilla ensena la leccion de de que no se debe permitir mas nunca la llegada al poder de las escorias humanas como la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak y hay que eliminar sin piedad a estos traidores.
					
					 La nacion coreana pasara sin falta las cuentas de los horribles crimenes de la banda traidora surcoreana.

articles.title: Nadie tiene derecho a censurar medida autodefensiva de RPDC, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nadie tiene derecho a censurar medida autodefensiva de RPDC, insiste Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, 25 de febrero (ACNC) -- La prueba nuclear subterranea de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es un producto de la brutal campana de Estados Unidos y sus satelites para aplastarla y una de las justas medidas de autodefensa frente al chantaje nuclear del imperio.
					 Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en su articulo individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					 En el nuevo siglo, el imperio yanqui incluyo a la RPDC en la lista de blancos de ataque nuclear y recrudecio el chantaje nuclear sobre ella.
					
					 Tales hechos obligaron a la RPDC a disponerse del disuasivo nuclear para frenar el estallido de guerra nuclear por parte de EE.UU.
					
					 Si la RPDC no hubiera poseido el poderoso disuasivo nuclear, ya se habria desatado varias veces la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 En ese sentido, la tercera prueba nuclear de la RPDC marca un hito importante para defender la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, el Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo.
					
					 Ahora, muchos especialistas militares evaluan que la RPDC contribuyo grandemente con su exitosa prueba nuclear al mantenimiento de la paz y seguridad de la peninsula, las regiones perifericas y el mundo entero.
					
					 Esto significa que ya paso una vez por todas el tiempo en que los imperialistas norteamericanos amenazaban unilateralmente con artefactos nucleares.
					
					 El imperio debe dejar su aventurero intento de probar a la RPDC.
					
					 Hoy en dia, el arma nuclear ya no es objeto monopolizado por Estados Unidos.
